text:
Amazon Bedrock and Gen AI in
general is a huge opportunity
for us and for our customers.

AWS and Bedrock certainly
tick all the boxes for TUI.

Amazon Bedrock provides a
ton of value back to Alida.
Within Amazon Bedrock,
we use four different models today

because our solution is based
on a multi-model approach.
We select the best model

for the specific use case that
we have at the best price.

We use Amazon Bedrock
to read a legacy PNR,
or Passenger Reservation,
and it was interesting to watch

how even stuff that we didn't
train, contextual stuff,
came back in the responses.
We took textual information

and passed it into a large
language model offered
by Amazon Bedrock

to actually be able to
intelligently process that data
and grab those data points for us.

The good part about this is
we only had to do a few clicks
and a few lines of code,

and it was able to scale for
our entire customer base,
both in the United States and globally.
It's very helpful

because these services
are very innovative,
very easy to use,

and we can focus on what
is the added value for us,
which is the business topics.
In the AI space,

we are really working on
with customers together
to find out the use cases
and what are the next level optimizations.
